resources.string: Most views will show a blue vertical bar on the left of your screen. That means there is a Left Menu available which you can access by swiping from the left of your screen. If you are using any CARPE Controller the left menu can usually be accessed by pressing Up or Down.

string-array.name: terrain_speed_modes
string-array.item: Wheel sensor only when low GPS Accuracy

string-array.name: terrain_odo_modes
string-array.item: Wheel sensor only when low GPS Accuracy

resources.string: Cannot connect, make sure you are online / try restarting the app!
Only use if your motorcycle came equipped with an Android device with Drive Mode Dashboard 2 pre-installed.
To use the Roadbook view you need to purchase the Roadbook Plugin. Currently in one hour demo mode.
To use the Map view you need to purchase the Map Plugin. Currently in one hour demo mode.
Error while trying to use your SDCard, this will not work on this device!
No SDCard present or not compatible!
Move all your map files to the SDCard?
Move all your map files to the Internal Memory?
Move the Left Menu to the right
Visit the official Drive Mode Dashboard website
DMD2 is brought to you by
Visit and follow our Facebook page for the latest news
Join the discussion about new features, bugs and requests
Re-Order the menu entries and enable/disable them
Touch and hold to move item. Use the switch to show or hide.
Discover the available plugins for DMD2. Purchase and manage your subscriptions!

The map plugin adds a 3D rendered map view to DMD2. It includes Topographic offline maps, graded ground type, ability to load multiple GPX files with many GPX options like (track color/width/transparency) and even widgets for speed, heading, altitude or OBD values.
This item is purchased and active, no further action needed.
You already purchased the lifetime version. There is no need for extra subscriptions.
You already have an active subscription, do you want to cancel it first?
No Internet connection! To manage purchases and subscriptions you need an active internet connection.

The roadbook plugin adds the ability to load a PDF roadbook file. You can configure up to 4 instruments like total and partial distances, heading, speed and chronometer and control everything using a Bluetooth CARPE Controller.
Controller: Up/Down changes by 1, ZoomIn/Out changes by 100, Center/Enter long press resets to zero, Left/Right for Cancel/Save
If disabled you need to start the trip manually
Trip will automatically reset if DMD2 is closed for more than a configurable amount of time
Hiding speed and odo is useful if you want to make Trip Values bigger
Since different devices use different values for the maximum brightness we need to get it first. Please manually go to system menu and set your brightness to the maximum and then press SAVE
Controller: Use Zoom buttons to increase/decrease and Enter/Center Click to change Auto/Manual
Controller: Use Left or Right buttons to exit
Controller: Use Zoom buttons to increase/decrease and Enter/Center Click to change source
To fully adjust all volumes we need permission for DND Mode!
Controller: Press up to select a slider, press down to return to menu.
Instead of just locking rotation in DMD2 it will lock system wide even when DMD2 is running in the background
Tap to edit the Total Distance instrument value:
Tap to edit the Partial Distance instrument value:
Available options for the Total Distance Instrument:
Choose the amount of decimal places to show for the Total value:
Available options for the Partial Distance Instrument:
Choose the amount of decimal places to show for the Partial value:
Long Press Joystick Center Click / Terrain Enter
Scroll paper down once on partial reset
Also disable screen touch when Controller Lock Mode is Enabled
Long press joystick center click / Terrain Enter will always toggle Controller Lock Mode
Controller: Use Up/Down/Left/Right to select button. Enter/Center Click to select.
Controller: Use Left/Right to select button. Enter/Center Click to select.
Controller: Up/Down changes by 0.01, ZoomIn/Out changes by 1, Center/Enter long press resets to zero, Left/Right for Cancel/Save
Your distance measures will be multiplied by the value inserted here. Use this as a correction factor to match the Roadbook distance values.
Use magnetic sensor for heading when stopped

Our map can display standard OSM or Topographic OSM (with altitude lines) information. The standard is optimized for road navigation and the topographic for off-road exploration. Please select which do you want to use:
Use Up/Down/Left/Right to move the map. Long Press Enter/Center Click to exit.
Hillshading is a technique for creating relief maps, showing the topographical shape of hills and mountains using shading.
Data Type: Online (Needs Internet Connection) will Create Offline Cache
Power Usage: Increases Power Consumption by up to 20%!
Use Up/Down to change the map tilt. Press Enter/Center Click to save & exit.
This track does not contain any waypoint!
Track does not contain any waypoint.
This is the first point for this GPX
This is the last point for this GPX
You need to free at least
A corrupted map file was detected, the file was deleted and you need to download it again. The bad file is:
There was an error loading this GPX, it seems it is not compatible with DMD2, please try a different one.
Are you sure you want to delete this map file?
This track is the sum of
Track will be merged with Visible Tracks
Track will be hidden from List
Hide waypoints that are further away from the track for a distance superior to:
Processing Visible Waypoints… This can take a while!
Did not find any Waypoint matching the criteria. Maybe try a smaller distance.
Waypoints matching your criteria. These Waypoints are now hidden!
Waypoint will be removed from list
Last GPX track / No connection to other
Show GPX Track Next Waypoint box
You cannot name a folder Recordings or Imported!
A folder with that name already exists, try another name!
You cannot copy to this folder, select another!
Click on the folder where you want to place the file!
Choose how to share the file
You cannot delete files from Imported folder!
You cannot rename a file in this directory!
A file with the same name already exists!
There was an error renaming the file!
When stopped use Compass Sensor for heading (if available)
If enabled when you long press enter/joystick center it will lock DMD2 in map view. Up/Down/Left/Right will pan the map. Long Press enter again to exist lock mode.
Maximum allowed accuracy in meters (lower accuracy is more precise but might skip points)

string-array.name: gpx_auto_record_reason
string-array.item: Date Based - 1 file per day (Changes at 00:00)
Time Stopped - Starts new file after at least 6h stopped
Time Stopped - Starts new file after at least 8h stopped
Time Stopped - Starts new file after at least 12h stopped
Time Stopped - Starts new file after at least 24h stopped

resources.string: Are you sure you want to finish the recording? This cannot be undone!
GPX Recording is empty, no file created!
A file with that name already exists, please choose a different name!
GPX not recording. Start recording first!
You have not recorded any point yet!
No valid location yet, try again after you get a valid location update!
Recorder is stopped, nothing to edit!
Tap anywhere on the track to cut back to that point, use the crosshair button above to cut to your current location, or use the controls to move in time:
Select from paired bluetooth devices. Make sure dongle is paired first!
Select which OBD Protocol to use
Commands to configure bluetooth reader, separate with new line
Use GPS/Terrain Wheel Sensor instead of OBD Speed value (which might not be available)
Set your vehicle maximum RPM value
Set your ideal gear shift RPM value
This sensor is not available on all vehicles
BT OBD Dongle Disconnected (Controller: Press Joystick Center / Terrain Enter to connect)
If enabled will attempt to connect to OBD Dongle on app start
Use actual OBD2 raw value or calibrate minimum and maximum positions

This will start a dialog with instructions for throttle minimum/maximum position calibration. Requires the ECU to be ON and OBD dongle connected, the engine should be off. This will NOT change any value in your ECU!
PLEASE TURN ON THE ENGINE! Make sure vehicle is at stable post warm-up idle!!! Your throttle should be at the minimum position (at idle / totally off). Press the SET button when ready.
PLEASE TURN OFF THE ENGINE AND LEAVE IGNITION ON! Make sure your throttle position is in the maximum position (full open throttle). Press the SET button when ready.
Please Connect to the OBD Dongle First!
Please Configure BT OBD Dongle First!
If your level is not reported by the ECU you can let DMD2 calculate it based on average mileage per tank. To reset press the fuel icon when you fill up.
What is your average mileage with a full tank (insert in KMs)
Are you sure you want to restart the fuel level counter? Make sure you have a full tank!
Indicate the number of gears your bike has
Gear calculator only calculates the gear above this RPM
There is no DTC error to view!
Click here to read how to calculate the gear ratios
Will start a dialog to assist you finding your gear ratios (you will need to ride the bike on all gears)
Ride at a steady speed with the indicated gear engaged and when the ratio value stabilizes press NEXT.

Thank you for using DMD2, we hope you are enjoying it! 

We are constantly working on this project to bring you new features! 

If you want to support this project please consider purchasing anything from our shop, It will also remove this Ads view! 
Some of the stuff we are working on includes, route calculation, turn by turn navigation, POI search, weather information, multi-device sync and online file management, user accounts and location sharing (viewing everyone on the map), among many other features!

Remove the Support DMD2 menu entry and all adds from the app. Only buy this plugin if you do not want any other plugin since buying any other plugin will also remove the view and adds. (Requires app restart after purchase)
